channel.title: Adam1990 on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Adam1990 on ZooBerry

item.title: Flamingo Frenzy Zoo Save File
item.description: This is a 2 and a half star zoo that contains 6 different kinds of flamingos, one being the greater flamingo.

item.title: Komodo Falls Zoo Save File
item.description: This is a 5 star zoo that has 3 waterfalls (2 huge ones) and many rare animals including the Giant Panda, Florida Panther, and the Ethiopian Wolf. There is also a sky tram. You need the AA and ES expansions for this zoo to work. I hope you enjoy the Komodo Falls Zoo!

item.title: Wallaroo
item.description: It is one star, main biome is scrub, but it also likes alpine.

item.title: Dwarf Panda
item.description: An extinct version of the giant panda, about half its size.
